nodes.bodyText: It would be nice to move this to common.gradle (we can do it in another change to avoid having to re-test this). Glad to see postcommits passing.
nodes.diffHunk:

+plugins { id 'org.apache.beam.module' }
+applyPythonNature()
+
+// Required to setup a Python 3 virtualenv and task names.
+pythonVersion = '3.8'
+apply from: '../common.gradle'
+
+def pythonDir = "${rootDir}/sdks/python"
+
+task hdfsIntegrationTest {
